title: Luminary Atelier Codex
subtitle: Operating manuals for Arcanea production guilds

preface.invocation: The atelier exists to turn vision into orchestrated delivery.
body: Every guild in Arcanea shares a playbook. This codex captures the briefs, rituals, and quality loops that keep projects on tempo.
Adapt these pages to your realm. Share your improvements with the council so the craft keeps advancing.
preface.oath: We build with clarity, ship with excellence, and celebrate the craft.

chapters.title: Chapter I – Priming the Guild
chapters.tagline: Start each project aligned and resourced

epigraph.text: A strong launch removes half the friction.

introduction: Priming rituals ensure every contributor understands the realm promise, creative goals, and delivery cadence.

sections.heading: Immersion Brief
body: Summarize promise, audience, outcomes, and success signals.
List must-hit beats and non-negotiables.

artifacts.name: Brief Deck
artifacts.description: 10-slide deck used for kickoff and investor syncs.

sections.heading: Resourcing Grid
body: Map owners, contributors, Guardians, suppliers.
Highlight capacity, availability, and budget.

insights.title: Risk Preflight
insights.detail: Note top 3 risks and mitigation owners.

rituals: Run a 60-minute priming session with humans + Guardians.
Publish minutes and decisions in the project channel.

measurements.name: Kickoff Clarity Score
measurements.description: Team survey on clarity after priming.

chapters.title: Chapter II – Prototype Constellations
chapters.tagline: Prove the feel, the function, and the lore

epigraph.text: Momentum comes from sharing prototypes early and often.

introduction: Constellations deliver three proofs—experience, operation, stewardship—within 72 hours.

sections.heading: Triad Proofs
body: Prototype the emotional moment, the system behavior, and the ethical implications.
Compare actual signal vs. intended reaction.
principles: Move fast, document, and mark what still feels off.

sections.heading: Critique Orbits
body: Stage reviews: core guild, cross-realm partners, community.
Translate feedback into adjustments with owners and dates.

measurements.name: Constellation Velocity
measurements.description: Number of triad proofs completed per cycle.

chapters.title: Chapter III – Build & QA
chapters.tagline: Keep craft high and debt low

epigraph.text: Quality is a ritual, not a phase.

introduction: The atelier models debt proactively. Guardian automations catch regressions, humans keep the taste.

sections.heading: Quality Gates
body: Define acceptance criteria per stream: content, design, code, music, ops.
Guardians run automated checks, humans sign off.

insights.title: Taste Panel
insights.detail: Invite external experts for critical launches.

sections.heading: Debt Ledger
body: Log shortcuts, classify by impact, assign payoff windows.
principles: Never ship debt without an owner.
Clear top priority debt every sprint.

chapters.title: Chapter IV – Launch & Operations

epigraph.text: A launch should feel like a ritual and run like a well-oiled system.

introduction: This chapter aligns creative spectacle with ops excellence.

sections.heading: Runbook
body: Timeline key moments: pre-launch, live window, sustain.
Assign control room, incident response, live commentary roles.

artifacts.name: Launch Console
artifacts.description: Dashboard merging metrics, Guardian alerts, comms.

sections.heading: Support & Growth
body: Prep help docs, moderator scripts, upgrade flows.
Plan follow-up beats to sustain momentum.

measurements.name: Launch Health
measurements.description: Blend of availability, sentiment, and conversion.

entries.heading: Brief Checklist
body: Promise
Audience
Outcomes
Signals
Risks

entries.heading: Constellation Kit
body: Prototype canvas

Feedback rubric

Layered critique round bringing in broader stakeholders.
